contents: 读了，红脖媒体日常 propaganda，了无新意。还是那些 sh*t，东拼西凑又一篇。唯一能跟标题对得上的新内容是一段引号里的话 "Before the virus hit Europe, Italy sent tons of PPE to China to help China protect its own population. China then has sent Italian PPE back to Italy -- some of it, not even all of it ... and charged them for it"，还是引自连名字都没有的 "a senior Trump administration official"。请问这也叫新闻？
